entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
